      • becomeCandidate

        public void becomeCandidate(VotingBooth vb,
                            RoutingTable rt,
                            Ledger ledger)
        Transitions state of node to become a Candidate. It also sets the intialized flag to false which will allow it to execute its initialization code only once later. This method will also trigger the voting booth's startElection() method.
        Parameters:
        vb - The VotingBooth Object to start new election
        rt - The RoutingTable Object to broadcast new votes
        ledger - The Ledger Object to determine info in Votes

      • becomeLeader

        public void becomeLeader(RoutingTable rt)
        Transitions state of node to become a Leader. It also sets the initialized flag to false which will allow it to execute its initialization code only once later. Once the state has changed, the main thread will recognize the node to be a leader and begin broadcasting AppendEntries RPCs.
        Parameters:
        rt - The RoutingTable Object to

      • matchRoute

        public boolean matchRoute(Route route)
        Is the route parameter the same as the member variable route
        Parameters:
        route - The Route to match against this node's route
        Returns:
        Return boolean based on whether provided route mathces this node's route
